title: Mantra Of Avalokiteshvara
lyrics: tone intro :  Namo Ratna Tra yaya, Namo Arya Jnana Sagara, Vairochana, Byuhara Jara Tathagataya, Arahate, Samyaksam Buddhaya, Namo Sarwa Tathagate Bhyay, Arhata Bhyah, Samyaksam Buddhe Bhyah, Namo Arya Avalokite shoraya Bodhisattvaya Maha Sattvaya, Maha Karunikaya, Tadyata, Om Dara Dara, Diri Diri, Duru Duru Itte We, Itte Chale Chale, Purachale Puracha le, Kusume Kusuma Wa Re, Ili Milli, Chiti Jvalam, Apanaye Shoha.
